originalText.text:
My wife purchased her first veh, a Atlast Cross Sport 2024. I knew from the onset of entering the dealership that our experience would have been memorable. We were immediate greeted as we walked in, offered refreshments and introduced to our sales guy, Jeff. His knowledge and professionalism is what did it for us. On behalf of my wife and myself and to Jeff and the team @ ManhattanVW I want to thank you guys for providing impeccable service.
Ps My wife loves the car. Usually she preferred to be driven around, but now I canâ€™t get her from behind the wheel ðŸ˜„

originalText.text: Ok so today I went to Open Road Volkswagen in Manhattan and I am glad I did. I heard that the go to guy was Jeff. The manager direct me to Chris Garcia, well just to make to story short Chris was amazing, honest, yes honest, transparent right up at front. I had a trade in which they took it right in and at the end of the day I drove off on a brand new ID4. This kind of service is very hard to find specially on this kind of business where most of the time sales people are there not to make costumers happy, all they care is to maximize their commissions. Not at this place, Jeff you did a great job mentoring Chris Garcia, and Chris keep doing what you are doing honesty is rare to find and at Open Road Volkswagen Manhattan you will definitely find honesty and transparency.

originalText.text: What a great experience ! It was my first time buying a car in Manhattan and I was very reluctant. Prior to my visit  I did my homework and I new exactly what car I wanted. Even if I came prepared I still had a few questions. My salesman was Fantastic! Jeff guided me all the way without any pressure. We tested drive the car he was very nice and knew everything about it. Once it was time to close the deal he got me the best deal I could have imagined! If you are on the market for a Volkswagen or simply for a new car stop by this dealership and ask for Jeff. You will be in very good hands !

originalText.text: I can't believe i can buy a vehicle in Manhattan. Thank you Cristian. A very nice guy. Very professional for their vehicle. Very good service. They Also accept trade in with good price.  We make a win win deal in a week.

originalText.text: We had an enjoyable experience at VW Manhattan! Both me and my husband were welcomed and treated great the second we walked in. Our Sales Consultant Tom H was knowledgeable and went above and beyond for us. Steve K also helped us out a lot throughout the process. This dealership was a great environment to be around and we are so happy that we purchased our first family vehicle with them!
